Name.label: Nephropathy secondary to a storage or other metabolic disease
Rare genetic parathyroid disease and phosphocalcic metabolism disorder
Rare parathyroid disease and phosphocalcic metabolism anomaly
Rare disorder potentially indicated for kidney transplant

TextSection.Contents: A rare, genetic, phosphocalcic metabolism disorder characterized by early-onset hypercalcemia, hypophosphatemia, hypercalciuria, decreased intact parathyroid hormone serum levels and medullary nephrocalcinosis, typically manifesting with failure to thrive, hypotonia, vomiting, constipation and/or polyuria.

Name.label: BTNT (broader term maps to a narrower term)
E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))

Synonym.label: Familial infantile hypercalcemia with suppressed intact parathyroid hormone

Name.label: cytochrome P450 family 24 subfamily A member 1
